qualifier:
Unprotected call to method of un-annotated interface org.apache.http.client.cache.HttpCacheEntryFactory. Consider annotating the class with `@ThreadSafe`, adding a lock, or using an interface that is known to be thread-safe.
 Reporting because the current class is annotated `@ThreadSafe`.
